name: UpBanx
headline: Brex for D2C Brands and Content Creators in Indonesia
description:
UpBanx is Brex for D2C brands and content creators in Indonesia. We help our customers open a high-yield business account, get financing, manage transactions, and launch Web3 projects, all in one place. There are over 700k D2C brands and content creators in Indonesia. If we serve all of them, that is a $14b/year market opportunity.

We've raised $5.6m so far from investors like Y Combinator, Alpha JWC, Alto Partners, CreditEase, Oliver Jung and lndonesia's biggest influencer Raffi Ahmad who has over 100m followers on social. We have also raised from 6 other Y Combinator founders. We are open to working with more investors that can bring strategic value to our long-term roadmap.

founders.name: Wafa Taftazani, Founder
founders.description: Award-winning Cambridge-educated executive, entrepreneur and investor with 10+ years of experience across technology, digital entertainment, corporate finance, public policy, and international relations.

faq FrequentlyAskedQuestions
How is UpBanx different from other financial services? 
Our purpose is to help creators like you achieve financial goals without fuss! Instead of having multiple apps for different financial products, UpBanx brings together relevant financial products for you in one single app, catered to your needs as a creator. 
Is it safe to use UpBanx? 
UpBanx is safe! UpBanx offers financial products on our app in conjunction with our licensed partners, such as Modal Rakyat which are supervised by OJK. For every new financial product we offer, we will always make sure to work with trusted and fully-licensed partners. 
How does UpBanx work? 
Download our app on Play Store for Android or App Store for iOS, create an account, complete our verification and KYC process, and you're set! 
Do I have to pay anything to use UpBanx? 
UpBanx is free to download and access, as long as you meet our minimum requirements for a creator. Each financial product on our app will have their respective fee stated on its confirmation page.

generated_description:
**UpBanx: Your Financial Ally in Indonesia's D2C and Creator Economy**

Founded in 2021 and currently thriving out of Jakarta, UpBanx is on a mission to be the financial backbone for Direct-to-Consumer (D2C) brands and content creators in Indonesia. Think of UpBanx as a localized equivalent of Brex, providing a high-yield business account, financing options, transaction management, and support for Web3 projects—all in one user-friendly platform.

### The Market Opportunity

UpBanx is targeting a booming market. With over 700,000 D2C brands and content creators in Indonesia, it is hovering over a potential annual market opportunity of $14 billion. That's significant for a relatively young fintech startup.

### Investment and Growth

Backed by $5.6 million from notable investors, including Y Combinator and the Indonesian influencer Raffi Ahmad—who boasts a staggering 100 million followers—UpBanx is well-positioned to take on the market. Their funding also involves contributions from six other Y Combinator alumni, showcasing a strong network of entrepreneurial support.

### Features That Matter

UpBanx isn't just about banking; it's about empowering creators and brands with tools tailored for their unique challenges:

- **Financing:** Access automatic invoice financing at an attractive admin fee of only 1.8–2.5% per month.
  
- **Invoice Management:** An intuitive invoice generator to streamline billing and reminders. No more missed payments.
  
- **Financial Statements:** Quick and easy generation of financial reports to help businesses track their performance effortlessly.

- **UpThinx:** A cutting-edge AI-powered content generator that helps brands maintain their messaging and brand voice consistently.

### Team and Community

The UpBanx team, currently composed of 13 talented individuals, collaborates under the guidance of Gustaf Alstromer from Y Combinator. They've surrounded themselves with a community that understands the creator economy, garnering trust and insights from top names in Indonesia’s entertainment landscape.

### Safety and Accessibility

Rest assured; UpBanx prioritizes user security by partnering with licensed financial entities, ensuring compliance with regulations and offering peace of mind with its financial products. Users can download the app for free, with comprehensive features available upon meeting the minimum requirements.

### Conclusion

UpBanx is riding the wave of a digital transformation in Indonesia’s financial landscape. By addressing the specific needs of D2C brands and content creators, they're not just offering services but changing how financial power translates into creative freedom. It’s all about enabling creators to focus on what they love while empowering them with the financial tools they need.

For more information, check out their website at [UpBanx.com](http://UpBanx.com).
